channel.title: nodejs on Kevin Schaul
channel.description: Recent content in nodejs on Kevin Schaul

item.title: find-which-npm-dependency-has-dependency
item.description: Wow, a lifesaver command right here: npm ls TROUBLESOME_PACKAGE This will output a tree showing all of the node packages in your local project that depend on TROUBLESOME_PACKAGE. Dear lord have I needed this so many times.
